ProcessTemplates.Name: Local Excel to Microsoft SQL
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template will go through a folder, parse Excel files into a DataSet form and insert the parsed data to a Microsoft SQL database table.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/path/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Local folder location with the Excel-files to be transmitted to Microsoft SQL database."},"MicrosoftSqlConnectionString":{"Value":"\"Server=myServerAddress;Database=myDataBase;User Id=myUsername;Password=myPassword;\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The connection string for Microsoft SQL database."},"TableName":{"Value":"\"ExampleTable\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The table name in Microsoft SQL database."}}
